Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory215.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'All of the surveying instruments are up and operational—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Campfire ready, tent is up, and we got fish from the bear... Good, all ready.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Commandant, we just need to keep watch here until morning.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Rosetta tells you so as she adds firewood to the campfire. The branches dried beforehand immediately catch fire as they join the pile.'}
{3: 'The campfire flares up, burning and blooming like a blossom. The embers dance sporadically in the air, become taken by the Arctic wind, then fall and go out on the snow.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Commandant, thank you so much for coming with me on this mission.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'This feels more like a vacation than a mission.', 3: '13', 4: 'I did promise you after all.', 5: '14'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'The engineers also said that this is kind of a vacation. Most of them were just reluctant to leave the engineering bay.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'I see... Thank you, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'After that, Rosetta falls quiet, occasionally adding in firewood and glancing at the surveying instrument.'}
{3: 'The engineers specified that, since this is the last survey, they will not dispatch another crew to recover the instruments.'}
{3: 'So Rosetta will need to wait here for all instruments to obtain enough data, then pack everything up and bring it back to Babylonia.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Commandant, you can go rest in the tent if you're tired. I'll be on night watch.", 4: '1'}
{2: "I'm not tired yet.", 3: '22', 4: 'I feel bad leaving it all to you...', 5: '23'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Really...? I think you should still rest while you can, though. After all, who knows what could happen?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "It's okay. This is my duty, after all. Not to mention, Constructs are more suitable for this kind of work.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{3: 'Rosetta is about to badger you into sleeping again, but a sudden tremor causes her to pause.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "It's... raining?", 4: '1'}
{2: "This is the first time I've seen it rain here.", 3: '32', 4: 'Do you have an umbrella?', 5: '33'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'No, not just that... Coupled with the tremors—Commandant, I recommend that we hurry up and take shelter.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'We might have a situation, Commandant. We need to find shelter ASAP.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Seeing the rain, Rosetta immediately wields her weapon. Her eyes meet your befuddled ones.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Commandant, remember what the bear said about working at the climate station?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yes.', 3: '37', 4: 'Did he cause those tremors?', 5: '38'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I don't have any evidence, but based on the change in weather, there may be something wrong with the climate station.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "No, I don't think so. But it looks like there's a problem with the climate station.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Earthquakes, rain... Who knows what might come next. I'm worried that the tent won't keep us safe out here in the snowfield.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Anyway, come with me, quick. There should be a Forest Guard shelter up ahead.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory218.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'We should be safe here.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You and Rosetta find shelter in a cave. The entrance of the cave howls as ice and snow whirl in the frigid wind.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I knew it... Looks like we'll be stuck here for a few hours as we wait out the blizzard.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Not my lucky day, huh...', 3: '47'}
{3: 'Hearing you utter her catchphrase, Rosetta pauses before breaking into a chuckle.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Never thought you'd have this playful side to you... But it really is unfortunate to have this happen on the last day. We'll likely have to recalibrate the equipment.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "But on the whole, I guess I'm pretty lucky.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Without giving you a chance to react, Rosetta leans over.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Through all this misfortune, I got to see the world for my own and come to my own conclusions.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "And now, I'm sitting in the same place as you, 【kuroname】.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I'm not very good at expressing myself, but I can tell that you're trying to get to know me.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: '...Which is why I asked you to come to the Arctic with me, so I can show you how I live in the wild. I wanted to tell you all that you want to know about me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'So, 【kuroname】... Do you know me a bit better now?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "That's great. I'm not too good at introducing myself to others, after all.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Then let's take it slow in the future. We still have many more fights ahead of us. We have the time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Speaking of, I've been telling you everything that's on my mind... Since the mission will have to be suspended in this weather anyway...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Think you could tell me more about yourself, 【kuroname】? I feel like the Babylonia records don't paint the whole picture.", 4: '1'}
{2: "I don't know where to begin...", 3: '64', 4: 'This will take some time.', 5: '65'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Anything works—your hobbies, your past, or whatever is on your mind... Anything.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I don't mind...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Before this snowstorm stops—', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bionic Bear', 3: "Uh, sorry folks, but uh... I'm taking shelter here, too, aye?", 4: '1'}
